title: "Google CEO Sundar Pichai Says ""Artificial Intelligence (AI) Will Be the Biggest Technological Shift We See in Our Lifetimes."" 5 Stocks to Buy and Hold If He's Right."
text: "Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai believes that AI might be ""bigger than the internet itself."" The AI revolution will not be evenly distributed
source_name: with some companies better positioned to profit from the technology."

title: "Dutch groups sue Google over alleged privacy violations"
text: "The Dutch consumers' association Consumentenbond together with the Privacy Protection Foundation issued legal proceedings against Google on Tuesday for alleged large-scale privacy violations

title: "A Bull Market Is Coming: Is It Time to Revamp Your Portfolio?"
text: "You may want to add some more growth stocks to your portfolio -- but you should think twice before making major changes to your asset allocations. It's best to establish a long-term investment strategy and stick with it."
